001package gbw.melange.common.errors;
002
003
004import com.badlogic.gdx.Gdx;
005import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.GL30;
006import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
007
008public final class Errors {
009
010    /**
011     * Throws an exception immediately if a gl error is present.
012     * Also prepends the error code to any message provided:
013     * <pre>
014     * {@code "| GL Error <errVal> | + <your message>"}
015     * </pre>
016     */
017    public static void checkAndThrow(String msg){ //Delete body on release build
018        int someGlErr = Gdx.gl.glGetError();
019        if(someGlErr != GL30.GL_NO_ERROR){
020            throw new RuntimeException("| GL Error " + someGlErr + " | " + msg);
021        }
022    }
023
024    /**
025     * Invokes the logger and prints the message, prepended error code much like {@link gbw.melange.common.errors.Errors#checkAndThrow(String)},
026     * if a gl error is present
027     */
028    public static void checkAndLog(Logger logger, String msg){ //Delete body on release build
029        int someGlErr = Gdx.gl.glGetError();
030        if(someGlErr != GL30.GL_NO_ERROR){
031            logger.warn("| GL Error " + someGlErr + " | " + msg);
032        }
033    }
034
035    @FunctionalInterface
036    public interface ThrowingRunn<R extends Throwable>{
037        void apply() throws R;
038    }
039    @FunctionalInterface
040    public interface ErrorProvider{
041        Error run();
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * Escalate anything to a runtime exception.
046     * @param func void func no args but throws
047     * @param <R> type of exception
048     */
049    public static <R extends Throwable> void escalate(ThrowingRunn<R> func){
050        try{
051            func.apply();
052        }catch (Throwable r){
053            throw new RuntimeException(r);
054        }
055    }
056
057    public static void escalate(ErrorProvider func){
058        Error err = func.run();
059        if(err != Error.NONE){
060            throw new RuntimeException(err.msg());
061        }
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Deescalate anything that throws and return the message as a String instead
066     * @param func void func no args but throws
067     */
068    public static <R extends Throwable> Error deescalate(ThrowingRunn<R> func){
069        try{
070            func.apply();
071        }catch (Throwable r){
072            return new Error(r.getMessage());
073        }
074        return Error.NONE;
075    }
076
077}
078
